dublin_core.dcvalue: Health workforce cross border mobility has an impact not only on individual health workers but also on how health services are organized planned and delivered This paper presents the results of a study of current mobility trends of health professionals along the borders between Portugal and Spain The objective was to describe the profile of mobile physicians and nurses to elicit the opinions of employers on mobility factors to describe incentive policies to retain or attract health professionals and to collect and analyse employers opinions on the impact of this mobility on their health services
Trends of cross-border mobility of physicians and nurses between Portugal and Spain.
